case.name: Quinlan v A & J Brady Pty Ltd [2007] FCA 1409 (12 September 2007)

citances.sentence: 1 On 12 September 2007 I delivered judgment in this matter: Quinlan v A & J Brady Pty Ltd [2007] FCA 1409. I ordered that the application be dismissed, and directed that the parties file written submissions in relation to costs. Those submissions were subsequently filed.
